 2030:     E1 = element(I, H1),
 2031:     if 
 2032: 	E1 =< E2 ->
 2033: 	    keymerge2_1(I, T1, E2, H2, T2, [H1 | M]);
 2034: 	true ->
 2035: 	    keymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, H1, T2, [H2 | M])
 2036:     end;
 2037: keymerge2_1(_I, [], _E2, H2, T2, M) ->
 2038:     lists:reverse(T2, [H2 | M]).
 2039: 
 2040: keymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, H1, [H2 | T2], M) ->
 2041:     E2 = element(I, H2),
 2042:     if
 2043: 	E1 =< E2 ->
 2044: 	    keymerge2_1(I, T1, E2, H2, T2, [H1 | M]);
 2045: 	true ->
 2046: 	    keymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, H1, T2, [H2 | M])
 2047:     end;
 2048: keymerge2_2(_I, T1, _E1, H1, [], M) ->
 2049:     lists:reverse(T1, [H1 | M]).
 2050: 
 2051: rkeymerge2_1(I, [H1 | T1], E2, H2, T2, M) ->
 2052:     E1 = element(I, H1),
 2053:     if
 2054: 	E1 =< E2 ->
 2055: 	    rkeymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, T2, [H2 | M], H1);
 2056: 	true ->
 2057: 	    rkeymerge2_1(I, T1, E2, H2, T2, [H1 | M])
 2058:     end;
 2059: rkeymerge2_1(_I, [], _E2, H2, T2, M) ->
 2060:     lists:reverse(T2, [H2 | M]).
 2061: 
 2062: rkeymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, [H2 | T2], M, H1) ->
 2063:     E2 = element(I, H2),
 2064:     if
 2065: 	E1 =< E2 ->
 2066: 	    rkeymerge2_2(I, T1, E1, T2, [H2 | M], H1);
 2067: 	true ->
 2068: 	    rkeymerge2_1(I, T1, E2, H2, T2, [H1 | M])
 2069:     end;
 2070: rkeymerge2_2(_I, T1, _E1, [], M, H1) ->
 2071:     lists:reverse(T1, [H1 | M]).
 2072: 
 2073:

 2137: %% OTP-7230. seq/1,2 returns the empty list.
 2138: otp_7230(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2139:     From = -10,
 2140:     To = 10,
 2141:     StepFrom = -10,
 2142:     StepTo = 10,
 2143: 
 2144:     L = lists:seq(From, To),
 2145:     SL = lists:seq(StepFrom, StepTo),
 2146:     [] =
 2147: 	[{F, T, S} ||
 2148: 	    F <- L, T <- L, S <- SL,
 2149: 	    not check_seq(F, T, S, catch lists:seq(F, T, S))
 2150: 		orelse
 2151: 		S =:= 1 andalso not check_seq(F, T, S, catch lists:seq(F, T))
 2152:         ].
 2153: 
 2154: check_seq(From, To, 0, R) ->
 2155:     From =:= To andalso R =:= [From]
 2156: 	orelse
 2157: 	From =/= To andalso is_tuple(R) andalso element(1, R) =:= 'EXIT';
 2158: check_seq(From, To, Step, []) when Step =/= 0 ->
 2159:     0 =:= property(From, To, Step)
 2160: 	andalso
 2161: 	  (
 2162: 	  Step > 0 andalso To < From andalso From-To =< Step
 2163: 	  orelse
 2164: 	  Step < 0 andalso To > From andalso To-From =< -Step
 2165: 	 );
 2166: check_seq(From, To, Step, R) when R =/= [], To < From, Step > 0 ->
 2167:     is_tuple(R) andalso element(1, R) =:= 'EXIT';
 2168: check_seq(From, To, Step, R) when R =/= [], To > From, Step < 0 ->
 2169:     is_tuple(R) andalso element(1, R) =:= 'EXIT';
 2170: check_seq(From, To, Step, L) when is_list(L), L =/= [], Step =/= 0 ->
 2171:     First = hd(L),
 2172:     Last = lists:last(L),
 2173:     Min = lists:min(L),
 2174:     Max = lists:max(L),
 2175: 
 2176:     [] =:= [E || E <- L, not is_integer(E)]
 2177: 	andalso
 2178:     %% The difference between two consecutive elements is Step:
 2179: 	begin
 2180: 	    LS = [First-Step]++L,
 2181: 	    LR = L++[Last+Step],
 2182: 	    [Step] =:= lists:usort([B-A || {A,B} <- lists:zip(LS, LR)])
 2183: 	end
 2184: 	andalso
 2185:     %% The first element of L is From:
 2186: 	From =:= First
 2187: 	andalso
 2188:     %% No element outside the given interval:
 2189: 	Min >= lists:min([From, To])
 2190: 	andalso
 2191: 	Max =< lists:max([From, To])
 2192: 	andalso
 2193:     %% All elements are present:
 2194: 	abs(To-Last) < abs(Step)
 2195: 	andalso
 2196: 	length(L) =:= property(From, To, Step);
 2197: check_seq(_From, _To, _Step, _R) ->
 2198:     false.
 2199: 
 2200: property(From, To, Step) ->
 2201:     ((To-From+Step) div Step).
 2202:

 2204:

 2298: %% Test lists:flatten/1,2 and lists:flatlength/1.
 2299: flatten_1(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2300:     [] = lists_flatten([]),

 2303:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([[1],2]),
 2304:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([[1],[2]]),
 2305:     [1,2] = lists_flatten([[1,2]]),
 2306:     [a,b,c,d] = lists_flatten([[a],[b,c,[d]]]),
 2307: 
 2308:     ok.
 2309: 
 2310: lists_flatten(List) ->
 2311:     Flat = lists:flatten(List),
 2312:     Flat = lists:flatten(List, []),
 2313:     Len = lists:flatlength(List),
 2314:     Len = length(Flat),
 2315:     Flat.

 2450: %% Test lists:filter/2, lists:partition/2.
 2451: filter_partition(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2452:     F = fun(I) -> I rem 2 =:= 0 end,
 2453:     filpart(F, [], []),
 2454:     filpart(F, [1], []),
 2455:     filpart(F, [1,3,17], []),
 2456:     filpart(F, [1,2,3,17], [2]),
 2457:     filpart(F, [6,8,1,2,3,17], [6,8,2]),

 2460:     %% Error cases.
 2461:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:filter(badfun, [])),
 2462:     {'EXIT',{function_clause,_}} = (catch lists:partition(badfun, [])),
 2463:     ok.
 2464: 
 2465: filpart(F, All, Exp) ->
 2466:     Exp = lists:filter(F, All),
 2467:     Other = lists:filter(fun(E) -> not F(E) end, All),
 2468:     {Exp,Other} = lists:partition(F, All).
 2469:

 2471: %% OTP-5939. Guard tests added.
 2472: otp_5939(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2473:     Fun1 = fun(A) -> A end,
 2474:     Fun2 = fun(A, B) -> {A,B} end,
 2475:     Fun3 = fun(A, B, C) -> {A,B,C} end,
 2476:     Pred = fun(_A) -> true end,
 2477:     Fold = fun(_E, A) -> A end,
 2478:     MapFold = fun(E, A) -> {E,A} end,
 2479: 
 2480:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:usort( [asd], [qwe])),
 2481: 
 2482:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:zipwith(func, [], [])),
 2483:     [] = lists:zipwith(Fun2, [], []),
 2484:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:zipwith3(func, [], [], [])),
 2485:     [] = lists:zipwith3(Fun3, [], [], []),
 2486:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymap(func, 1, [])),
 2487:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keymap(Fun1, 0, [])),
 2488:     [] = lists:keymap(Fun1, 1, []),
 2489:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(func, [], [1])),
 2490:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(func, [1], [])),
 2491:     [] = lists:merge(Fun2, [], []),
 2492:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(func, [], [1])),
 2493:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rmerge(func, [1], [])),
 2494:     [] = lists:rmerge(Fun2, [], []),
 2495:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:usort(func, [])),
 2496:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:usort(func, [a])),
 2497:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:usort(func, [a, b])),
 2498:     [] = lists:usort(Fun2, []),
 2499:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:umerge(func, [], [1])),
 2500:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:merge(func, [1], [])),
 2501:     [] = lists:umerge(Fun2, [], []),
 2502:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(func, [], [1])),
 2503:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:rumerge(func, [1], [])),
 2504:     [] = lists:rumerge(Fun2, [], []),
 2505:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:all(func, [])),
 2506:     true = lists:all(Pred, []),
 2507:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:any(func, [])),
 2508:     false = lists:any(Pred, []),
 2509:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:map(func, [])),
 2510:     [] = lists:map(Fun1, []),
 2511:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:flatmap(func, [])),
 2512:     [] = lists:flatmap(Fun1, []),
 2513:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:foldl(func, [], [])),
 2514:     [] = lists:foldl(Fold, [], []),
 2515:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:foldr(func, [], [])),
 2516:     [] = lists:foldr(Fold, [], []),
 2517:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:filter(func, [])),
 2518:     [] = lists:filter(Pred, []),
 2519:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:partition(func, [])),
 2520:     {[],[]} = lists:partition(Pred, []),
 2521:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:filtermap(func, [])),
 2522:     [] = lists:filtermap(Fun1, []),
 2523:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:foreach(func, [])),
 2524:     ok = lists:foreach(Fun1, []),
 2525:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:mapfoldl(func, [], [])),
 2526:     {[],[]} = lists:mapfoldl(MapFold, [], []),
 2527:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:mapfoldr(func, [], [])),
 2528:     {[],[]} = lists:mapfoldr(MapFold, [], []),
 2529:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:takewhile(func, [])),
 2530:     [] = lists:takewhile(Pred, []),
 2531:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:dropwhile(func, [])),
 2532:     [] = lists:dropwhile(Pred, []),
 2533:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:splitwith(func, [])),
 2534:     {[],[]} = lists:splitwith(Pred, []),
 2535: 
 2536:     ok.
 2537: 
 2538: %% OTP-6023. lists:keyreplace/4, a typecheck.
 2539: otp_6023(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2540:     {'EXIT', _} = (catch lists:keyreplace(a, 2, [{1,a}], b)),
 2541:     [{2,b}] = lists:keyreplace(a, 2, [{1,a}], {2,b}),
 2542: 
 2543:     ok.

 2545: %% OTP-6606. sort and keysort bug.
 2546: otp_6606(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2547:     I = 1,
 2548:     F = float(1),
 2549:     L1 = [{F,I},{F,F},{I,I},{I,F}],
 2550:     L1 = lists:keysort(1, L1),
 2551:     L1 = lists:sort(L1),
 2552:     L2 = [{I,I},{I,F},{F,I},{F,F}],
 2553:     L2 = lists:keysort(1, L2),
 2554:     L2 = lists:sort(L2),
 2555:     ok.

 2557: %% Test lists:suffix/2.
 2558: suffix(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2559:     true = lists:suffix([], []),
 2560:     true = lists:suffix([], [a]),
 2561:     true = lists:suffix([], [a,b]),
 2562:     true = lists:suffix([], [a,b,c]),
 2563:     true = lists:suffix([a], lists:duplicate(200000, a)),
 2564:     true = lists:suffix(lists:seq(1, 1024),
 2565: 			lists:seq(2, 64000) ++ lists:seq(1, 1024)),
 2566:     true = lists:suffix(lists:duplicate(20000, a),
 2567: 			lists:duplicate(200000, a)),
 2568:     true = lists:suffix([2.0,3.0], [1.0,2.0,3.0]),
 2569: 
 2570:     %% False cases.
 2571:     false = lists:suffix([a], []),
 2572:     false = lists:suffix([a,b,c], []),
 2573:     false = lists:suffix([a,b,c], [b,c]),
 2574:     false = lists:suffix([a,b,c], [a,b,c,a,b]),
 2575:     false = lists:suffix(lists:duplicate(199999, a)++[b],
 2576: 			 lists:duplicate(200000, a)),
 2577:     false = lists:suffix([2.0,3.0], [1,2,3]),
 2578: 
 2579:     %% Error cases.
 2580:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix({a,b,c}, [])),
 2581:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix([], {a,b})),
 2582:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix([a|b], [])),
 2583:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix([a,b|c], [a|b])),
 2584:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix([a|b], [a,b|c])),
 2585:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch lists:suffix([a|b], [a|b])),
 2586: 
 2587:     ok.
 2588: 
 2589: %% Test lists:subtract/2 and the '--' operator.
 2590: subtract(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2591:     [] = sub([], []),
 2592:     [] = sub([], [a]),
 2593:     [] = sub([], lists:seq(1, 1024)),
 2594:     sub_non_matching([a], []),
 2595:     sub_non_matching([1,2], [make_ref()]),
 2596:     sub_non_matching(lists:seq(1, 1024), [make_ref(),make_ref()]),
 2597: 
 2598:     %% Matching subtracts.
 2599:     [] = sub([a], [a]),
 2600:     [a] = sub([a,b], [b]),
 2601:     [a] = sub([a,b], [b,c]),
 2602:     [a] = sub([a,b,c], [b,c]),
 2603:     [a] = sub([a,b,c], [b,c]),
 2604:     [d,a,a] = sub([a,b,c,d,a,a], [a,b,c]),
 2605:     [d,x,a] = sub([a,b,c,d,a,x,a], [a,b,c,a]),
 2606:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,9999,10000,20,21,22] =
 2607: 	sub(lists:seq(1, 10000)++[20,21,22], lists:seq(10, 9998)),
 2608: 
 2609:     %% ERL-986; an integer overflow relating to term comparison
 2610:     %% caused subtraction to be inconsistent.
 2611:     Ids = [2985095936,47540628,135460048,1266126295,240535295,
 2612:            115724671,161800351,4187206564,4178142725,234897063,
 2613:            14773162,6662515191,133150693,378034895,1874402262,
 2614:            3507611978,22850922,415521280,253360400,71683243],
 2615: 
 2616:     [] = id(Ids) -- id(Ids),
 2617: 
 2618:     %% Floats/integers.
 2619:     [42.0,42.0] = sub([42.0,42,42.0], [42,42,42]),
 2620:     [1,2,3,4,43.0] = sub([1,2,3,4,5,42.0,43.0], [42.0,5]),
 2621: 
 2622:     %% Crashing subtracts.
 2623:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([], [a|b])),
 2624:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a], [a|b])),
 2625:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a|b], [])),
 2626:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a|b], [])),
 2627:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub([a|b], [a])),
 2628: 
 2629:     %% Trapping, both crashing and otherwise.
 2630:     [sub_trapping(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 18)],
 2631: 
 2632:     %% The current implementation chooses which algorithm to use based on
 2633:     %% certain thresholds, and we need proper coverage for all corner cases.
 2634:     [sub_thresholds(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 32)],
 2635: 
 2636:     %% Trapping, both crashing and otherwise.
 2637:     [sub_trapping(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 18)],
 2638: 
 2639:     %% The current implementation chooses which algorithm to use based on
 2640:     %% certain thresholds, and we need proper coverage for all corner cases.
 2641:     [sub_thresholds(N) || N <- lists:seq(0, 32)],
 2642: 
 2643:     ok.
 2644: 
 2645: id(I) -> I.
 2646: 
 2647: sub_non_matching(A, B) ->
 2648:     A = sub(A, B).
 2649: 
 2650: sub(A, B) ->
 2651:     Res = A -- B,
 2652:     Res = lists:subtract(A, B).
 2653: 
 2654: sub_trapping(N) ->
 2655:     List = lists:duplicate(N + (1 bsl N), gurka),
 2656:     ImproperList = List ++ crash,
 2657: 
 2658:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub_trapping_1(ImproperList, [])),
 2659:     {'EXIT',_} = (catch sub_trapping_1(List, ImproperList)),
 2660: 
 2661:     List = List -- lists:duplicate(N + (1 bsl N), gaffel),
 2662:     ok = sub_trapping_1(List, []).
 2663: 
 2664: sub_trapping_1([], _) -> ok;
 2665: sub_trapping_1(L, R) -> sub_trapping_1(L -- R, [gurka | R]).
 2666: 
 2667: sub_thresholds(N) ->
 2668:     %% This needs to be long enough to cause trapping.
 2669:     OtherLen = 1 bsl 18,
 2670:     Other = lists:seq(0, OtherLen - 1),
 2671: 
 2672:     Disjoint = lists:seq(-N, -1),
 2673:     Subset = lists:seq(1, N),
 2674: 
 2675:     %% LHS is disjoint from RHS, so all elements must be retained.
 2676:     Disjoint = Disjoint -- Other,
 2677: 
 2678:     %% LHS is covered by RHS, so all elements must be removed.
 2679:     [] = Subset -- Other,
 2680: 
 2681:     %% RHS is disjoint from LHS, so all elements must be retained.
 2682:     Other = Other -- Disjoint,
 2683: 
 2684:     %% RHS is covered by LHS, so N elements must be removed.
 2685:     N = OtherLen - length(Other -- Subset),
 2686: 
 2687:     ok.
 2688:

 2694:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = (catch lists:droplast(x)),
 2695: 
 2696:     ok.

 2712: %% Briefly test the common high-order functions to ensure they
 2713: %% are covered.
 2714: hof(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 2715:     L = [1,2,3],
 2716:     [1,4,9] = lists:map(fun(N) -> N*N end, L),
 2717:     [1,4,5,6] = lists:flatmap(fun(1) -> [1];
 2718: 				 (2) -> [];
 2719: 				 (3) -> [4,5,6]
 2720: 			      end, L),
 2721:     [{1,[a]},{2,[b]},{3,[c]}] =
 2722: 	lists:keymap(fun(A) -> [A] end, 2, [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}]),
 2723: 
 2724:     [1,3] = lists:filter(fun(N) -> N rem 2 =:= 1 end, L),
 2725:     FilterMapFun = fun(1) -> true;
 2726: 		      (2) -> {true,42};
 2727: 		      (3) -> false
 2728: 		   end,
 2729:     [1,42] = lists:filtermap(FilterMapFun, L),
 2730:     [1,42] = lists:zf(FilterMapFun, L),
 2731: 
 2732:     [3,2,1] = lists:foldl(fun(E, A) -> [E|A] end, [], L),
 2733:     [1,2,3] = lists:foldr(fun(E, A) -> [E|A] end, [], L),
 2734:     {[1,4,9],[3,2,1]} = lists:mapfoldl(fun(E, A) ->
 2735: 					       {E*E,[E|A]}
 2736: 				       end, [], L),
 2737:     {[1,4,9],[1,2,3]} = lists:mapfoldr(fun(E, A) ->
 2738: 					       {E*E,[E|A]}
 2739: 				       end, [], L),
 2740: 
 2741:     true = lists:any(fun(N) -> N =:= 2 end, L),
 2742:     false = lists:any(fun(N) -> N =:= 42 end, L),
 2743: 
 2744:     true = lists:all(fun(N) -> is_integer(N) end, L),
 2745:     false = lists:all(fun(N) -> N rem 2 =:= 0 end, L),
 2746: 
 2747:     ok.
 2748: 
 2749: %% Test lists:enumerate/1 and lists:enumerate/2

 2751:     [] = lists:enumerate([]),

 2753:     [{1,a},{2,b},{3,c}] = lists:enumerate([a,b,c]),
 2754:     [{10,a},{11,b},{12,c}] = lists:enumerate(10, [a,b,c]),
 2755:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = catch lists:enumerate(0),
 2756:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = catch lists:enumerate(0, 10),
 2757:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = catch lists:enumerate(1.0, []),
 2758:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = catch lists:enumerate(1.0, [a,b,c]),
 2759:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = catch lists:enumerate(<<1>>, []),
 2760:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = catch lists:enumerate(<<1>>, [a,b,c]),
 2761:     {'EXIT', {function_clause, _}} = catch lists:enumerate(1, <<1,2,3>>),
 2762: 
 2763:     ok.

 2765: error_info(_Config) ->
 2766:     L = [{keyfind, [whatever, bad_position, bad_list], [{2,".*"},{3,".*"}]},
 2767:          {keymember, [key, 0, bad_list], [{2,".*"}, {3,".*"}]},
 2768:          {keysearch, [key, bad_position, {no,list}], [{2,".*"}, {3,".*"}]},
 2769:          {member, [whatever, not_a_list]},
 2770:          {member, [whatever, [a|b]]},
 2771:          {reverse, [not_a_list, whatever]}
 2772:         ],
 2773:     do_error_info(L).
 2774: 
 2775: do_error_info(L0) ->
 2776:     L1 = lists:foldl(fun({_,A}, Acc) when is_integer(A) -> Acc;
 2777:                         ({F,A}, Acc) -> [{F,A,[]}|Acc];
 2778:                         ({F,A,Opts}, Acc) -> [{F,A,Opts}|Acc]
 2779:                      end, [], L0),
 2780:     Tests = ordsets:from_list([{F,length(A)} || {F,A,_} <- L1] ++
 2781:                                   [{F,A} || {F,A} <- L0, is_integer(A)]),
 2782:     Bifs0 = [{F,A} || {M,F,A} <- erlang:system_info(snifs),
 2783:                       M =:= lists,
 2784:                       A =/= 0],
 2785:     Bifs = ordsets:from_list(Bifs0),
 2786:     NYI = [{F,lists:duplicate(A, '*'),nyi} || {F,A} <- Bifs -- Tests],
 2787:     L = lists:sort(NYI ++ L1),
 2788:     error_info_lib:test_error_info(lists, L, [snifs_only]).
 2789: 
 2790: uniq_1(_Config) ->
 2791:     [] = lists:uniq([]),
 2792:     [foo] = lists:uniq([foo]),
 2793:     ["foo", "bar", "zoo"] = lists:uniq(["foo", "foo", "bar", "foo", "zoo",
 2794:                                         "foo", "bar", "zoo"]),
 2795:     [a, 1, b, 2] = lists:uniq([a, a, a, 1, b, 2, a, 2, 1]),
 2796:     [<<"home">>, "home"] = lists:uniq([<<"home">>, "home"]),
 2797:     [3.14159, 2.71828, 3.17] = lists:uniq([3.14159, 3.14159, 2.71828, 3.17]),
 2798:     [42, 42.0] = lists:uniq([42, 42.0, 42, 42.0]),
 2799:     ok.
 2800: 
 2801: uniq_2(_Config) ->
 2802:     [] = lists:uniq(fun(X) -> X end, []),
 2803:     [{42, 1}, {42.0, 99}, {a, 99}] =
 2804:         lists:uniq(fun(X) -> element(1, X) end,
 2805:                    [{42, 1}, {42.0, 99}, {a, 99}, {a, 1}, {42, 100}]),
 2806:     [1] = lists:uniq(fun(_) -> whatever end, lists:seq(1, 10)),
 2807:     ok.
